mapper.sql: fid, tag, makeTime, borrowNumber ,action, actionTime, fileName, fileDes ,creatId, fileState, fileWhere, fileAbandon, dataStr ,filePermission ,fileAttribution
mapper.insert: insert into fidfile (fid, tag, makeTime, borrowNumber ,action, actionTime, fileName, fileDes ,creatId, fileState, fileWhere, fileAbandon, dataStr ,filePermission ,fileAttribution) values (#{fid}, #{tag}, #{makeTime}, #{borrowNumber} ,#{action}, #{actionTime}, #{fileName}, #{fileDes} ,#{creatId}, #{fileState}, #{fileWhere}, #{fileAbandon}, #{dataStr} ,#{filePermission} ,#{fileAttribution})

insert into fidfile (fid, tag, makeTime, borrowNumber ,action, actionTime, fileName, fileDes ,creatId, fileState, fileWhere, fileAbandon, dataStr ,filePermission ,fileAttribution) values (#{fid}, #{tag}, #{makeTime}, #{borrowNumber} ,#{action}, #{actionTime}, #{fileName}, #{fileDes} ,#{creatId}, #{fileState}, #{fileWhere}, #{fileAbandon}, #{dataStr} ,#{filePermission} ,#{fileAttribution})
